content: Dr. Claude Tardif Skip to main content Skip to "About this site" Dr. Claude Tardif Dr. Claude Tardif Office: Girouard building, room 319 Telephone: (613) 541-6000 ext 6649 Fax: (613) 541-6584 E-mail: Claude.Tardif@rmc-cmr.ca Department of Mathematics and Computer Science College Address Royal Military College of CanadaPO Box 17000, Station ForcesKingston, Ontario, CANADAK7K 7B4 Research Interests: Graph theory, more specifically colourings, homomorphisms, products and applications of linear programming to graph colouring problems.
